metadata.name: District Court Civil Petition
metadata.description: Civil suit/petition template for filing before District Courts and Civil Courts. Suitable for civil suits, declaratory suits, and injunction matters.

required_fields.label: Plaintiff/Petitioner Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the plaintiff or petitioner

required_fields.label: Plaintiff/Petitioner Address
required_fields.description: Complete address of the plaintiff for service
required_fields.example: Mohalla Katra, Tehsil Sadar, District Agra - 282001

required_fields.label: Defendant Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the defendant

required_fields.label: Defendant Address
required_fields.description: Complete address of the defendant for service of summons

required_fields.label: Cause of Action
required_fields.description: Facts constituting the cause of action and when it arose
required_fields.example: The defendant illegally encroached upon the plaintiff's land measuring 500 sq. yards on 01.06.2023 at Village Nagla, Agra.

required_fields.label: Relief Sought
required_fields.description: Specific reliefs and prayers being claimed in the suit
required_fields.example: a) Decree for possession; b) Permanent injunction; c) Mesne profits; d) Costs of the suit

required_fields.label: Jurisdiction Ground
required_fields.description: Basis for the court's territorial and pecuniary jurisdiction
required_fields.example: This Court has jurisdiction as the suit property is situated within its territorial limits and suit is valued at Rs. 5,00,000/-

optional_fields.label: Interim Relief
optional_fields.description: Any temporary injunction or interim relief sought
optional_fields.example: Temporary injunction restraining the defendant from further construction on the suit property

optional_fields.label: Court Fee Details
optional_fields.description: Details of court fee affixed as per valuation
optional_fields.example: Court fee of Rs. 2,500/- affixed as per Section 7 of Court Fees Act

template_content:
IN THE COURT OF CIVIL JUDGE/DISTRICT JUDGE
_______________

ORIGINAL SUIT NO. _____ OF _____

{petitioner_name}
S/o, D/o, W/o _______________
R/o {petitioner_address}
... Plaintiff

VERSUS

{respondent_name}
S/o _______________
R/o {respondent_address}
... Defendant

SUIT FOR _______________

VALUATION FOR:
Court Fee: Rs. _______________
Jurisdiction: Rs. _______________

The plaintiff above-named respectfully submits as under:

1. PARTIES:
[Description of parties]

2. JURISDICTION:
{jurisdiction_ground}

3. FACTS:
[Detailed facts giving rise to the suit]

4. CAUSE OF ACTION:
{cause_of_action}

5. LIMITATION:
The suit is within limitation as the cause of action arose on _______________.

PRAYER:
It is, therefore, most respectfully prayed that this Hon'ble Court may be pleased to:

{relief_sought}

Plaintiff through Counsel
